channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ID

item.title: Report X-2023110557
item.description:
Report X-2023110557

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-06T18:14:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-26
  • City: BOISE
  • State: ID
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: AM QA discovered package leaking in unload. Employee put on proper PPE. Package was contained and placed in a lined hazmat bin. Bin was then placed in Hazmat cage under the air vent. DescribePack: This package had 4 bottle of Lacquer Thinner bottles that were tied inside a plastic bag and one of the caps was loose and some of the content spilled inside the bag. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Employee put on proper PPE. Package was contained and placed in a lined hazmat bin. Bin was then placed in Hazmat cage under the air vent.

item.title: Report X-2023110532
item.description:
Report X-2023110532

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-04T15:11:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-25
  • City: BOISE
  • State: ID
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: AM QA discovered package leaking in unload. Employee put on proper PPE. Package was contained and placed in a lined hazmat bin. Bin was then placed in Hazmat cage under the air vent. DescribePack: There were 7 boxes inside this package that each contained 30 test tubes that were filled with hydrogen peroxide. 3 of the boxes were damaged resulting in all 30 tubes of those 3 boxes to break and spill on the box. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Employee put on proper PPE. Package was contained and placed in a lined hazmat bin. Bin was then placed in Hazmat cage under the air vent.
